sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
ideally should happen
, želimo, da bi se nekaj zgodilo, čeprav ni mogoče.

seg.quote: The government should ideally be run by the people.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
ideally suited for something
, je kar najbolj primeren za nekaj.

seg.quote: He considered himself ideally suited for the job.
